text: Arthur Gordon Linkletter (born Arthur Gordon Kelly, or Gordon Arthur Kelley, July 17, 1912 â€“ May 26, 2010) was a Canadian-born American radio and television personality. He was born in Moose Jaw, Saskatchewan. Linkletter was the host of House Party and People Are Funny, on NBC radio and TV for 19 years. He became a naturalized United States citizen in 1942.
